wikipedia_page.main:
William Henry Hitchener was a British author.
He had two books published in 1813, St. Leonard's Forest, Vol. 1.2 (London Chapple 1813 ISBN 3-628-47673-9) and The Tower of Ravenwold, Vol. 1.2 (London Chapple 1813 ISBN 3-628-47674-7). Both books are travel books.

response: *William Henry Hitchener – The Towers of Ravenswold
